data.title: Buy Time Warner Cable
data.meta_description: Spectrum TV in HD looks so good you’ll wonder how you ever watched TV without it! Spectrum offers the most channels in HD. You can watch movies, sports, local news, your favorite shows and more in high definition. How does … Continued
data.text:
Save More with Spectrum Internet Prices

Spectrum® delivers the high speed you need for a great online experience. You can choose from a number of internet service offers and pick the package and price that suits your lifestyle and budget. Enter your address to view the Spectrum Internet service offers available to you and order service right here at BuyTimeWarnerCable.com!

Internet Service includes lots of extras – at no extra cost! Rhapsody RadioPLUS gives you access to radio stations online and you can customize your stations to suit your music preferences. If you think Online Internet service is fast, check out the NASCAR TrackPassSM to catch all the racing you can handle! Time Warner Cable Internet offers CNN News PassSM with up to 20 news video every day and Audible®, the leading provider of spoken entertainment online. Does your high-speed Internet also include Internet security software FREE with your subscription? Spectrum Internet includes Firewall & Anti-virus protection, parental controls and more.

Not sure what to look for? Click Order Online and enter your address to find the Spectrum Internet offers available to you. Or call us toll-free and a member of our Concierge Service will answer your questions and help you pick the Internet Service that’s right for you.

Single Play Internet: Promotion price is $44.99/mo. Yr 1; Standard rates apply after 1 year. No additional charge for modem; other equipment, install, taxes, fees & surcharges may apply.

©2017 Charter Communications, Inc. Offers are valid for a limited time only, to qualifying residential customers who have not subscribed to applicable services within the previous 30 days and have no outstanding obligation to Charter. Standard rates apply after promotion. TV equipment required & is extra; No additional charge for modem; Phone taxes, fees, & surcharges are included in price; other equipment, install, taxes, fees & surcharges may apply. Credit approval, prepayment or major credit card may be required. Services are subject to all applicable service terms & conditions, which are subject to change. Trademarks belong to their respective owners. Services not available in all areas. Restrictions apply.
